name: Tattoo Design AI - Generator
subtitle: Try On, Art Maker & Stencil
promotional_text: NEW: AI-powered tattoo cover-up designs! Generate unique tattoo art, try designs on your body in seconds, and explore 26+ styles. Your personal tattoo studio.
description:
Tattoo Design AI — Your Personal AI Tattoo Studio

Generate stunning, one-of-a-kind tattoo designs with the most advanced AI technology. Whether you're planning your first tattoo, looking for cover-up ideas, or exploring new styles — Tattoo Design AI turns your imagination into ink-ready art in seconds.

GENERATE FROM ANY IDEA
Describe your tattoo vision in words and watch AI create it instantly. From minimalist line art to full-color realism, every design is unique to you.

TRY ON YOUR BODY
Take a photo and see exactly how any design looks on your skin. Test placements on your arm, chest, back, leg, wrist, or any body part before committing to real ink.

TATTOO COVER-UP IDEAS
Upload a photo of an existing tattoo you want covered. AI analyzes the design and generates creative cover-up concepts tailored to your ink.

REMOVE TATTOO PREVIEW
Curious what you'd look like without a tattoo? AI can show you a preview of tattoo removal on any photo.

BLEND & MODIFY DESIGNS
Upload your own sketch or existing tattoo and enhance, modify, or transform it with AI. Combine multiple designs into one.

26+ TATTOO STYLES
Explore an extensive collection of curated styles:
• Traditional & Neo-Traditional
• Realism & Portrait
• Japanese Irezumi
• Dotwork & Geometric
• Tribal, Maori & Polynesian
• Minimalist & Fine Line
• Blackwork & Gothic
• Anime & Cyberpunk
• Calligraphy & Lettering
• Celtic, Religious & Abstract
• 3D, Astrology & more

SMART AI PROMPT ENHANCEMENT
Not sure how to describe your idea? Just type a few words and our AI enhances your prompt to generate the best possible design.

SAVE & SHARE
Save your favorite designs to your personal gallery. Share directly to Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, or Twitter. Cloud backup keeps your designs synced across all your devices.

PERFECT FOR EVERYONE
• First-timers exploring tattoo ideas
• Tattoo enthusiasts expanding their collection
• Artists seeking inspiration and references
• Anyone curious about how a tattoo would look

SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS
• Weekly: $9.99/week — 35 AI generations
• Monthly: $19.99/month — 80 AI generations (Save 50%)
• Free trial includes 1 AI generation

Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your App Store account settings after purchase.

Terms of Service: https://fahimanwer.com/aitattoo-terms
Privacy Policy: https://fahimanwer.com/aitattoo-privacy-policy
